name: Forte Fighters
description:
Enter Forte Fighters - a game where you have to stop the onslaught of attacking dogs with the power of your voice!

Made in around 3 hours for #Trijam 58 - Theme: 0 buttons.

Controls

Sing high to go up.

Sing low to go down.

Shout to shoot!

Settings

Press <p>  while singing to set the pitch where high/low are split at.

Press <v> while singing to set the minimum volume required to shoot.
